Apix.help: Pixel size (A); Required if translations are specified in Angstroms

parse_pose_csparc.desc: Parse image poses from a cryoSPARC .cs metafile

abinit.help: Flag if results are from ab-initio reconstruction

hetrefine.help: Flag if results are from a heterogeneous refinements (default: homogeneous refinement)

parse_ctf_star.desc: Parse CTF parameters from a RELION .star file

parse_ctf_csparc.desc: Parse CTF parameters from a cryoSPARC particles.cs file

downsample.desc: Downsample an image stack or volume by clipping fourier frequencies

D.help: New box size in pixels, must be even

is_vol.help: Flag if input .mrc is a volume

chunk.help: Chunksize (in # of images) to split particle stack when saving

datadir.help: Optionally provide path to input .mrcs if loading from a .star or .cs file

max_threads.help: Maximum number of CPU cores for parallelization (default: %(default)s)

D.help: New box size in pixels (if downsampling), must be even

window.help: Turn off real space windowing of dataset

lazy.help: Load whole dataset (faster than loading in batches)

window.help: Turn off real space windowing of dataset

datadir.help: Path prefix to particle stack if loading relative paths from a .star or .cs file

lazy.help: Lazy loading if full dataset is too large to fit in memory

shuffler_size.help: If non-zero, will use a data shuffler for faster lazy data loading.

num_workers.help: Number of subprocesses to use as DataLoader workers. If 0, then use the main process for data loading. (default: %(default)s)

max_threads.help: Maximum number of CPU cores for data loading (default: %(default)s)

random_tilts.help: Randomize ordering of tilts series to encoder

tdim.help: Number of nodes in hidden layers (default: %(default)s)

dose_per_tilt.help: Expected dose per tilt (electrons/A^2 per tilt) (default: %(default)s)

angle_per_tilt.help: Tilt angle increment per tilt in degrees (default: %(default)s)

beta.help: Choice of beta schedule or a constant for KLD weight (default: 1/zdim)

beta_control.help: KL-Controlled VAE gamma. Beta is KL target

norm.help: Data normalization as shift, 1/scale (default: mean, std of dataset)

multigpu.help: Parallelize training across all detected GPUs

pretrain.help: Number of epochs with fixed poses before pose SGD (default: %(default)s)

emb_type.help: SO(3) embedding type for pose SGD (default: %(default)s)

qdim.help: Number of nodes in hidden layers (default: %(default)s)

enc_mask.help: Circular mask of image for encoder (default: D/2; -1 for no mask)

use_real.help: Use real space image for encoder (for convolutional encoder)

pdim.help: Number of nodes in hidden layers (default: %(default)s)

pe_dim.help: Num frequencies in positional encoding (default: image D/2)

pretrain.help: Number of epochs with fixed poses before pose SGD (default: %(default)s)

emb_type.help: SO(3) embedding type for pose SGD (default: %(default)s)

dim.help: Number of nodes in hidden layers (default: %(default)s)

l_extent.help: Coordinate lattice size (if not using positional encoding) (default: %(default)s)

analyze.desc: Visualize latent space and generate volumes

epoch.help: Epoch number N to analyze (0-based indexing, corresponding to z.N.pkl, weights.N.pkl)

Apix.help: Pixel size to add to .mrc header (default is to infer from ctf.pkl file else 1)

downsample.help: Downsample volumes to this box size (pixels)

pc.help: Number of principal component traversals to generate (default: %(default)s)

ksample.help: Number of kmeans samples to generate (default: %(default)s)

vol_start_index.help: Default value of start index for volume generation (default: %(default)s)

lim.help: Start and end point of trajectory (default: 5/95th percentile)

use_percentile_spacing.help: Use equally spaced percentiles of the distribution instead of equally spaced points along the PC

direct_traversal.desc: Construct z path interpolating between anchor points

ind.help: Text file containing indices of anchor points

n.help: Number of points in between anchors, inclusive (default: %(default)s)

graph_traversal.desc: Find shortest path along nearest neighbor graph

analyze_landscape.desc: Pipeline to analyze cryoDRGN volume distribution

epoch.help: Epoch number N to analyze (0-based indexing, corresponding to z.N.pkl, weights.N.pkl)

outdir.help: Output directory for landscape analysis results (default: [workdir]/landscape.[epoch])

sketch_size.help: Number of volumes to generate for analysis (default: %(default)s)

Apix.help: Pixel size to add to .mrc header (default: %(default)s A/pix)

downsample.help: Downsample volumes to this box size (pixels) (default: %(default)s)

vol_start_index.help: Default value of start index for volume generation (default: %(default)s)

thresh.help: Density value to threshold for masking (default: half of max density value)

dilate.help: Dilate initial mask by this amount (default: %(default)s pixels)

mask.help: Path to a custom mask. Must be same box size as generated volumes.

linkage.help: Linkage for agglomerative clustering (e.g. average, ward) (default: %(default)s)

epoch.help: Epoch number N to analyze (0-based indexing, corresponding to z.N.pkl, weights.N.pkl)

N.help: Number of training volumes to generate (default: %(default)s)

shuffler_size.help: If non-zero, will use a data shuffler for faster lazy data loading.

pretrain.help: Number of initial iterations with random poses (default: %(default)s)

ps_freq.help: Frequency of pose inference (default: every %(default)s epochs)

reset_model_every.help: If set, reset the model every N epochs

reset_optim_every.help: If set, reset the optimizer every N epochs

reset_optim_after_pretrain.help: If set, reset the optimizer every N epochs

niter.help: Number of iterations of grid subdivision (default: %(default)s)

l_ramp_epochs.help: Number of epochs to ramp up to --l-end (default: %(default)s)

nkeptposes.help: Number of poses to keep at each refinement interation during branch and bound (default: %(default)s)

base_healpy.help: Base healpy grid for pose search. Higher means exponentially higher resolution (default: %(default)s)

pose_model_update_freq.help: If set, only update the model used for pose search every N examples

dim.help: Number of nodes in hidden layers (default: %(default)s)

l_extent.help: Coordinate lattice size (if not using positional encoding) (default: %(default)s)

pe_dim.help: Num frequencies in positional encoding (default: D/2)

eq_start_it.help: It at which equivariance turned on (default: %(default)s)

l_ramp_epochs.help: Number of epochs to ramp up to --l-end (default: %(default)s)

l_ramp_model.help: If 1, then during ramp only train the model up to l-max (default: %(default)s)

reset_model_every.help: If set, reset the model every N epochs

view_config.desc: Display config information of a cryoDRGN job

eval_vol.desc: Evaluate the decoder at specified values of z

prefix.help: Prefix when writing out multiple .mrc files (default: %(default)s)

zfile.help: Text file with z-values to evaluate

Apix.help: Pixel size to add to .mrc header (default: %(default)s A/pix)

downsample.help: Downsample volumes to this box size (pixels)

vol_start_index.help: Default value of start index for volume generation (default: %(default)s)

qdim.help: Number of nodes in hidden layers

pdim.help: Number of nodes in hidden layers

enc_mask.help: Circular mask radius for image encoder

pe_dim.help: Num sinusoid features in positional encoding (default: D/2)

ctf.help: CTF parameters (.pkl) for phase flipping images

reg_weight.help: Add this value times the mean weight to the weight map to regularize the volume, reducing noise.Alternatively, you can set --output-sumcount, and then use `cryodrgn_utils regularize_backproject` on the.sums and .counts files to try different regularization constants post hoc.

output_sumcount.help: Output voxel sums and counts so that different regularization weights can be applied post hoc, with `cryodrgn_utils regularize_backproject`.

datadir.help: Path prefix to particle stack if loading relative paths from a .star or .cs file

lazy.help: Lazy loading if full dataset is too large to fit in memory

first.help: Backproject the first N images (default: all images)

tilt.help: Flag to treat data as a tilt series from cryo-ET

ntilts.help: Number of tilts per particle to backproject (default: %(default)s)

dose_per_tilt.help: Expected dose per tilt (electrons/A^2 per tilt) (default: %(default)s)

angle_per_tilt.help: Tilt angle increment per tilt in degrees (default: %(default)s)

epoch.help: Latest epoch number N to analyze convergence (0-based indexing, corresponding to z.N.pkl, weights.N.pkl

outdir.help: Output directory for convergence analysis results (default: [workdir]/convergence.[epoch])

epoch_interval.help: Interval of epochs between calculating most convergence heuristics

force_umap_cpu.help: Override default UMAP GPU-bound implementation via cuML to use umap-learn library instead

subset.help: Max number of particles to be used for UMAP calculations. 'None' means use all ptcls

random_seed.help: Manually specify the seed used for selection of subset particles

random_state.help: Random state seed used by UMAP for reproducibility at slight cost of performance (default 42, None means slightly faster but non-reproducible)

n_epochs_umap.help: Number of epochs to train the UMAP embedding via cuML for a given z.pkl, as described in the cuml.UMAP documentation

skip_umap.help: Skip UMAP embedding. Requires that UMAP be precomputed for downstream calcs. Useful for tweaking volume generation settings.

n_bins.help: the number of bins along UMAP1 and UMAP2

smooth.help: smooth the 2D histogram before identifying local maxima

smooth_width.help: width of gaussian kernel for smoothing 2D histogram expressed as multiple of one bin's width

pruned_maxima.help: prune poorly-separated maxima until this many maxima remain

radius.help: distance at which two maxima are considered poorly-separated and are candidates for pruning (euclidean distance in bin-space)

final_maxima.help: select this many local maxima, sorted by highest bin count after pruning, for which to generate volumes

downsample.help: Downsample volumes to this box size (pixels). Recommended for boxes > 250-300px

device.help: Specify cuda device for volume generation, None to skip cuda.

skip_volgen.help: Skip volume generation. Requires that volumes already exist for downstream CC + FSC calcs

max_threads.help: Max number of threads used to parallelize mask generation

thresh.help: Float, isosurface at which to threshold mask; default None uses 50th percentile

dilate.help: Number of voxels to dilate thresholded isosurface outwards from mask boundary

dist.help: Number of voxels over which to apply a soft cosine falling edge from dilated mask boundary
